title: Alhamdulillah! A Hindu Woman Accepts Islam as her Way of Life
transcript: Hindu and Muslims amen [Applause] just for the benefit of those who understand Hindi the sister said that she had heard man lecture the first time a few years back in Azad Milan in Bombay on the topic similarities between Islam and Hinduism and since that day she has been appreciating Islam and today she has accepted Islam as a lifestyle and we welcome you to the religion of peace so we pray to Allah that may Allah accept and inshallah you get Jannah get the best of this world thank you sister [Applause]
